title: Academic liaison and interaction in polymer engineering with selected Chinese Universities
abstractText: To visit two key research centres in China for polymer engineering-related research (3 laboratories, including two Key State Laboratories), aimed at developing possibilities for cooperation and collaboration, exploring possible funding schemes and personnel-linking, mainly for the Bradford laboratory but also for the wider Polymer IRC group.
impactText: Top Chinese polymer engineering research groups were identified, for future collaboration, which has been successfully developed especially in the Science Bridges China platform. Chemicals,Healthcare,Manufacturing, including Industrial Biotechology,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology Cultural
findingsText: Top Chinese polymer engineering research groups were identified, for future collaboration We have already taken these forward in subsequent programmes and the Science Bridges China platform Chemicals,Healthcare,Manufacturing, including Industrial Biotechology,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
